summary: Aoi lives in an apartment by herself. Shusei moves in next to Aoi's apartment. Shusei is a very popular student. Due to a mistake, Aoi makes the sprinkler go off in his room. Until his room is fixed, he stays with Aoi.
cast: Kento Yamazaki|Ayame Gôriki|Reiko Takashima|Ren Kiriyama|Takashi Fujii|Miho Shiraishi|Anna Ishibashi|Seiji Fukushi|Akiyoshi Nakao|Kokoro Terada|Takeshi James Yamada|Rei Okamoto|Chiharu Tomita|Shôhei Abe|Wataru Kuriyama
keywords: girl wears a miniskirt|japanese girl|japanese school|asian school|school
